comments.body: We could maybe drop the alternatives with options from the sink API. If users need those, they may use the Flow API. WDYT?
I looked at it again, and the Sink variants are used quite extensively in tests. I say the shrinkage of the API surface is not worth the introduced discrepancy.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +36,40 @@   * @param options options to apply to the operation
   */
  def insertOne[T](collection: MongoCollection[T], options: InsertOneOptions): Sink[T, CompletionStage[Done]] =
    MongoFlow.insertOne(collection, options).toMat(Sink.ignore(), Keep.right[NotUsed, CompletionStage[Done]])
